abstract: Steve Jobs, Apple’s chief executive, said the iPhone would become available to British consumers in November in an exclusive arrangement with O2.
snippet: Steve Jobs, Apple’s chief executive, said the iPhone would become available to British consumers in November in an exclusive arrangement with O2.
lead_paragraph: LONDON, Sept. 18  Apple introduced the iPhone to Europe on Tuesday, hoping to entice consumers with a sleek design and the power of the Apple brand, even as it flouts some of the technological and marketing conventions of the European mobile business.

headline.main: IPhone Introduced to Europe, Where Standards Differ
headline.print_headline: IPhone Introduced to Europe, Where Standards Differ
